segment.source: MED-V Deployment and Configuration
segment.target: MED-V Deployment and Configuration

segment.source: MED-V Deployment and Configuration
segment.target: MED-V Deployment and Configuration

segment.source: MED-V Deployment and Configuration
segment.target: MED-V Deployment and Configuration

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: This section describes Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) deployment and configuration and includes the following:
segment.target: This section describes Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) deployment and configuration and includes the following:

segment.source: MED-V Installation Prerequisites
segment.target: MED-V Installation Prerequisites

segment.source: Describes the prerequisites required before installing MED-V.
segment.target: Describes the prerequisites required before installing MED-V.

segment.source: Supported Configurations
segment.target: Supported Configurations

segment.source: Describes the supported configurations for both MED-V 1.0 and MED-V 1.0 SP1.
segment.target: Describes the supported configurations for both MED-V 1.0 and MED-V 1.0 SP1.

segment.source: Installation and Upgrade Checklists
segment.target: Installation and Upgrade Checklists

segment.source: Provides the installation checklist for MED-V 1.0 and an upgrade checklist for MED-V 1.0 SP1.
segment.target: Provides the installation checklist for MED-V 1.0 and an upgrade checklist for MED-V 1.0 SP1.

segment.source: Installing and Configuring MED-V Components
segment.target: Installing and Configuring MED-V Components

segment.source: Provides procedures for installing and configuring the MED-V server, image repository, MED-V client, and MED-V management console, and the procedure for uninstalling the MED-V components.
segment.target: Provides procedures for installing and configuring the MED-V server, image repository, MED-V client, and MED-V management console, and the procedure for uninstalling the MED-V components.

segment.source: Creating a Virtual PC Image for MED-V
segment.target: Creating a Virtual PC Image for MED-V

segment.source: Describes how to create and configure a VPC image for MED-V.
segment.target: Describes how to create and configure a VPC image for MED-V.

segment.source: Creating a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Creating a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Describes how to create a MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Describes how to create a MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies

segment.source: Describes how to configure MED-V workspace policies.
segment.target: Describes how to configure MED-V workspace policies.

segment.source: Configuring MED-V for Remote Networks
segment.target: Configuring MED-V for Remote Networks

segment.source: Describes how to configure MED-V to work from inside a network, remotely, or both from inside the network and remotely.
segment.target: Describes how to configure MED-V to work from inside a network, remotely, or both from inside the network and remotely.

segment.source: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode

segment.source: Describes how to configure MED-V server using two servers and place all files mutual to both servers on a file system.
segment.target: Describes how to configure MED-V server using two servers and place all files mutual to both servers on a file system.
